UNIVERSITY OF WESTERN ONTARIO
The Educational Computing Organization of Ontario, April 9, 2005
Encription algorithms such as RSA ecryption rely on special large numbers that have as their factors too large primes. n=1, 2, ... are 3, 34, 299, 2625, 23378, 210035, ...
